original_text: And after the uproar was ceased, Paul called unto him the disciples, and embraced them, and departed for to go into Macedonia.
korean_text: 소요가 그치매 바울은 제자들을 불러 권한 후에 작별하고 떠나 마게도냐로 가니라

sentences.original_text: And after the uproar was ceased
Paul called unto him the disciples
and departed for to go into Macedonia
